      java.lang.Boolean createUser(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      Creates a user record in the database, with the inputed name,password pair.
      java.lang.Boolean deleteUser(java.lang.String name)
      Delete's a user from the database with the inputed name
      Profile getProfile(java.lang.String username)
      This method gets all the profile data from the database by user's name it is used for the first time the user loads their profile after logging in or switching back to their profile page from another page.

      Hashes a string using SHA-256
